attributes.action: Dual and Improve the A47 Acle Straigh
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned respectfully request that the government takes appropriate action on the A47 Acle Straight, Norfolk.
We request that no cross lane turning to avoid delays. We also request that the entire length of road is turned into dual carriage way. If this is not viable we ask at least some stretches suitable for overtaking safely are provided. We also request that road side ditches are either filled in or re-structured so as not to trap vehichles leaving the road in an accident.
